name: Zzt
description:
This game was developed for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 72 game jam

You move using the arrow keys or WASD keys

Warning:

  • I only managed to set aside 24 hours (give or take)  this past week to whip out this game
  • This game is in its very early stages
  • I didn't have time to make a win/lose condition
  • There's no UI
  • The collision sucks
  • Play at your own risk xD
